sentences.en: Calls to class member functions that have external linkage.
sentences.cn: 调用类中具有外部连接属性的成员函数.

sentences.en: Design of four - bar linkage is emphasis and difficulty of hydraulic support.
sentences.cn: 四 连杆机构 的设计是液压支架设计的重点和难点.

sentences.en: Electrical wires relay commands, replacing the usual cables and linkage controls.
sentences.cn: 电动线路代替了通常的电缆和联动装置来传达飞控命令.

sentences.en: Form urban linkage, information to share, the examination with efficient movement passageway.
sentences.cn: 形成市区联动 、 信息共享 、 运转高效的审批通道.

sentences.en: He insisted that there could be no linkage with other Mideast problems.
sentences.cn: 他坚持主张不把它与其他中东问题挂钩。

sentences.en: In all, the nitrogen and carbon ligands, to be effective, require linkage to other electronegative centers.
sentences.cn: 总的来说，氮和碳配体如要有效，就需要连接上其它电负性中心。

sentences.en: Naw an extensive list of linkage maps have been dvafted.
sentences.cn: 目前,一定数量牧草的遗传连锁图谱已经产生.

sentences.en: No one disputes the direct linkage between the unemployment rate and crime.
sentences.cn: 谁都不会质疑失业率与犯罪之间存在直接联系。

sentences.en: Normally, we use the word bond to describe the linkage between a particular pair of atoms.
sentences.cn: 通常我们用键这个词来描述指定的一对原子之间的键合.

sentences.en: Occasionally, problems with block inheritance or linkage are encountered.
sentences.cn: 有时会遇到区段遗传或连锁问题.

sentences.en: The mechanism is analyzed by using the industrial linkage theory.
sentences.cn: 文章拟用产业关联理论来分析煤电联动机制.

sentences.en: The motion of the slack diaphragm is transmitted through a mechanical linkage to an indicating scale.
sentences.cn: 弱膜片的运动通过联动机构传递给指示刻度盘.

sentences.en: There is no formal linkage between the two agreements.
sentences.cn: 这两项协议之间不存在正式的关联。

sentences.en: This chapter explores the linkage between economic development and the environment.
sentences.cn: 本章探讨的是经济发展与环境之间的关系。

sentences.en: This is useful to make a linkage and validate the relations between the Personas and the actual system actors that are determined (or possibly reverse-engineered) during the analysis phase.
sentences.cn: 建立连接并验证角色和分析阶段中确定的（或者可能是反向工程）实际系统参与者之间的关系是有用的。

sentences.en: This notion of " linkage ", they say, is the " mother of all myths "
sentences.cn: 他俩指出 “ 联系 ” 这一概念是 “ 所有迷思之母 ”
